name: TINANA Food Dehydrator Machine Dryer for Jerky: Stainless Steel Dehydrater for Fruit Herb - Digital Food Drier for Meat Beef Dehydration
short_description: 7 HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE RACKS: The food dehydrator is equipped with 7 BPA-free trays that can be rotated 180°to provide two adjustable heights, offering ample drying space for different sizes of food. Place the food in a single layer, allowing air to circulate around each piece.

TIMER & TEMPERATURE RANGE: Drying time is adjustable from 1-24 hours and temperature from 95-158°F(35-70°C). LED display shows the set temperature, time and remaining working time. Easy to dehydrate a variety of foods at accurate time and temperatures, remove moisture from food and retains most of its nutritional value.

EASY TO USE FOOD DEHYDRATOR MACHINE: The fruit dehydrator is easy to operate with a simple button press to set the timer and adjust the temperature. The meat dehydrator for jerky features a robust 400W drying capacity, ensuring an efficient food drying process. The 360°circulating airflow ensures even and efficient heat distribution. Jerky dehydrator dries evenly and quickly.

PREMIUM AND SPACE-SAVING DEHYDRATOR: Made of a stainless-steel base, 7 premium plastic trays and a silicone tong. The plastic trays are detachable and dishwasher safe for easy to cleaning and storage. The herb dehydrator’s compact size and stackable trays take up minimal counter space. Silicone tong facilitates easy handling of food.

VERSATILE MEAT DEHYDRATOR: The upgrade mushroom dehydrator can be used for jerky, beef, fruits, vegetables, herbs, flower tea, nuts, seafood, dog treats and other homemade snacks, allowing you to enjoy delicious and nutritious natural snacks.
PRECAUTIONS: To prevent overheating and potential damage to the dehydrated machine, change the order of the upper and lower trays periodically when dehydrating food.

product_description: The Elite Gourmet 5-Tier Digital Food Dehydrator has 350 Watts of drying power to efficiently dry & store foods with ease. Enjoy nutritious, delicious & low-calorie snacks with the Elite Gourmet Digital 5-Tray Food Dehydrator. The preset adjustable temperatures (95º to 158ºF) ensure that you’re drying foods at optimal temperature to achieve the best results. The base mounted fan & heater direct air flow upward into the 5 BPA Free, Innovative SlimStore® collapsible dehydrating trays maximizing air circulation for optimal, even & consistent drying. Family & friends can enjoy fresh options to add to breakfast, lunch, dinner or just a delicious snack. Each dehydrating trays provide 82 square inches of drying space for up to 410 square inches of total drying space (5-tray total). It’s easy, all you need to do is prep your favorite fruits, vegetables, spices, herbs or all types of meats for jerky and let the digital dehydrator do the rest. Preservation is important when you are looking to store delicious healthy food & snacks and retain the nutrients without additives, chemicals, and preservatives. Cleanup is simple, each tray& the lid are dishwasher safe or wash with warm soapy water.
